title: Secrets and Seduction
description: Dark academia meets forbidden loveWelcome to Preston Academy—watch your back, the walls have ears. You have been warned.Avery, a criminal, scarred and haunted by her past, finds herself at the Preston Academy—a boarding school for troubled juveniles.Alexander, a professor and heir to his parent’s legacy, is struck by Avery’s dark inner and bright outer beauty—and he hates her for it.The start of a forbidden romance. A tale full of mysteries and dangers. A love that ignites unknown passion and destroys the soul—especially when Avery discovers Alexander’s morbid secret. Will she give in to the seduction of hell itself, or can she save herself from her sealed fate?
author: Bianca Mov
